about_the_game:
This is a heart-pounding open-world multiplayer online game. In this thrilling adventure, you will assume the role of Susan. Determined to rescue her friend Kunkun, who has mutated into a terrifying monster after being infected with avian flu, Susan decides to venture deep into the forest in search of a method to save Kunkun. However, she discovers that the forest is not only shrouded in a pandemic but is also teeming with mutated creatures, including mysterious Lion Leopards, Pure Deer People, Hornless Sheep, Plum Meerkats, and more.

On the vast map, players will face the challenges of exploration, survival, and combat against various mutated creatures. Each type of animal has a unique method of capture, requiring players to cleverly use the environment and tools, learn their behavioral patterns, and devise effective strategies. These exotic creatures are not just threats but also key elements in the quest to rescue Kunkun.
